metadata.title: CVE-2017-18201 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GNU libcdio before 2.0.0. There is a double free in get_cdtext_generic() in lib/driver/_cdio_generic.c.

notes.note: leosilva> code not present in trusty, xenial and artful.

criterions.comment: libcdio package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-2').
